== Pudussery West (CT) (627651) ==

Pudussery West (CT) is a town in the [[Palakkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 20.62 sq. km. and harbouring 5016 households with total population of 20140 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 6 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 377 km. Male population is 9948 and female population is 10192. Scheduled Caste population is 3498 and Scheduled Tribes population is 68. Census Location Code of the town is 627651<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Palakkad (m) at a distance of 6 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Coimbatore(m corp. )  at a distance of 85 km. Railway station is at Palakkad at a distance of 6 km.
